news_header: Young supporters rally for President Yoon against impeachment, fearing leftist dictatorship and North Korean influence.
news_original_title: 'We will unite with Kim Jong Un': Conspiracies grip South Korea
news_text: On a cold January afternoon, pharmacy student Shin Jeong-min joined hundreds of supporters protesting against the impeachment of South Korea's suspended president, Yoon Suk Yeol. They fear that a leftist government would unify with North Korea and threaten democracy. Yoon's anti-communist rhetoric has resonated with many, especially the young, who now view China as a significant threat. Despite the majority wanting Yoon removed, his support has grown as fears of communism and external influence intensify.
